titleStmt.title: Nevves of the Netherlands Relating the whole state of those countries at this present.
Description of the prosperitie, strength, and wise government of the United Provinces of the Netherlands.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Edward Marchant,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A description of the prosperity of the vnited Prouinces.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of: A description of the prosperitie, strength, and wise government of the united Provinces of the Netherlands.
Two of the three known copies are bound with "A vision or dreame contayning the whole state of the Netherland warres".
Identified as STC 18444 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
